alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Teton, Fremont, northeastern Jefferson and northern Madison Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Last Chance to near Ashton to Egin. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Driggs, Ashton, Felt, Henrys Lake, Marysville, Sugar City, Teton, Parker, Tetonia, Drummond, Shotgun Village, Egin, Ponds Lodge, St Anthony, Plano, Island Park Village, Macks Inn, Chester, Last Chance and Island Park Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
